extras.new_content:
# Ensure method is a native string (handle bytes input)
        method = request.method
        if method is not None:
            method = to_native_string(method).upper()

        p.prepare(
            method=method,
            url=request.url,
extras.diff:
--- /workspace/requests/requests/sessions.py
+++ /workspace/requests/requests/sessions.py

+        method = request.method
+        if method is not None:
+            method = to_native_string(method).upper()
+
